items.title: Supreme Court of Canada dismisses B.C. ostrich farm attempt to save flock
items.description: The CFIA has said the application of the avian flu stamping out policy for this farm has been upheld by the Federal Court of Canada and the Federal Court of Appeal.

items.title: Supreme Court to weigh in on Saskatchewan's school pronoun case
items.description: The Supreme Court of Canada is set to announce whether it will hear appeals in a challenge of Saskatchewan's school pronoun law.

items.title: Here's what each federal department plans to cut under Budget 2025
items.description: Tuesday's federal budget  offers a glimpse into how dozens of government departments plan to rein in spending following this summer's comprehensive expenditure review. Here's a department-by-department breakdown.

items.title: The U.S. set to reveal which airports will see flight cuts amid shutdown
items.description: The U.S. Department of Transportation is initiating a 10 per cent reduction in capacity at 40 major U.S. airports, the department said in a statement.

items.title: Prince Harry to visit veterans in Toronto today ahead of Remembrance Day
items.description: Prince Harry is set to meet with some of Canada's oldest veterans today as part of his two-day visit to Toronto for events related to Remembrance Day.

items.title: David Common announced as CBC’s new Morning Live host
items.description: Veteran reporter and current Metro Morning radio host David Common will replace Heather Hiscox as host of CBC Morning Live, the Crown corporation announced Thursday. The announcement comes on the same day as Hiscox’s final broadcast as host and 20 years after she first took over the position.
